attributes.action: The students coming to UK from red countries be exepmted from Hotel Qurantine.
attributes.additional_details: This rule is merely a rule. It allows some population to take holidays and on the hand deprive some population from education which requires a travel to and from overseas. Trafic light system does not consider the literacy ratio of poor countries hence affects the approach of vaccinating themselves. This sytem is based on illogical requirements for example ratio of population vaccinated. The economy and affordability of countries to roleout mass vaccination programnes.
attributes.background: Pass a bill to end orthodox and decriminative approach on travel based on so called trafic light system.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/589699
